com.burstly.lib.util
Class LoggerExt

java.lang.Object
  com.burstly.lib.util.LoggerExt

public final class LoggerExt
extends Object

This is a logger class. You can enable or disable all log messages in property file.

logThrowable

public void logThrowable(String tag,
                         Throwable exception)
Log Throwable. Throwable stacktrace will be converted to string and will be printed under 'error' log level.

Parameters:
tag - String log tag
exception - Throwable

LoggerExt logger instance

setLogLevel

public static void setLogLevel(int logLevel)
Set global logging level. Available levels are: 
 1. NONE_LEVEL - no logs are in the logcat
 2. DEBUG_LEVEL - all logs are enabled
 3. INFO_LEVEL - minimul log level is INFO (all except DEBUG messages will be logged)
 4. WARN_LEVEL - minimul log level is WARN (WARN and ERROR messages will be logged)
 5. ERROR_LEVEL - minimum log level is ERROR (only ERRORs will be logged)
If you try to set unsupported log level it will be explicitly set to WARN_LEVEL.

Parameters:
logLevel - int log level to set

getLogLevel

public static int getLogLevel()
Current log level.

Returns:
int current log level
